attributes.action: new sight test for pcv and hgv drivers
attributes.additional_details: The new eye sight test for large vehicle drivers needs to be changed as it is unfair and biased as people who wear glasses to drive do so because it corrects their vision and just too say a person wears a certain prescription can't hold a licence even though they can see correctly with glasses is wrong and should be done on a case by case basis and there should be assistance if they cannot meet the standards set not just put on the scrapheap and there should also be some way it can be argued aswell and these decisions should be made by people who live in the real world not by people who think they do.
